name: Moon Cats
description:
Have you ever wondered what the story of Sailor Moon would be if it was told from Luna's perspective? Have you ever looked at a magical animal familiar and wondered what their day-to-day life is like? Have you ever summoned a companion and wondered where they go off to once your spell is up?

Moon Cats is a cozy game about being a magical cat, history, and taking your time to think things through. I hope you enjoy it.

Made for Nanoreno 2023
